mapper.select: select gevaId as gevaid, goodsName as goodsname, gevaText as gevatext, userAccount as useraccount, userIcon as usericon, userPetName as userpetname, gevaLevel as gevalevel, DATE_FORMAT(gevaDate,'%Y年%m月%d日 %H:%i:%s') as gevadate from goodsevaluation,goods,users where goodsevaluation.goodsId=goods.goodsId and goodsevaluation.userId=users.userId and goodsevaluation.goodsId=#{goodsId}
